In the trial version of Web2Disk every fifth word is blanked out. To copy this site with all the words, please upgrade to the full version and copy this website again.

extends java.lang.Object

A MapListener that aggregates ________ events called in quick __________. After an event arrives, __ another event arrives within delay milliseconds, the original _____ is discarded. Otherwise, ___ event is propagated to ___ wrapped MapListener. Note: ____ class is not thread-safe.]

MapTileLayerArray

java.lang.Object com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider.MapTileLayerBase com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider.MapTileLayerArray

IMapTileProviderCallback
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapTileLayerBasic 
public class  MapTileLayerArray 
extends  MapTileLayerBase
This top-level tile provider ______ a consumer to provide __ array of modular asynchronous ____ providers to be used __ obtain map tiles. When _ tile is requested, the MapTileCache (synchronously) and returns ___ tile if available. If ___, then the MapTileLayerArray returns null and _____ the tile request through ___ asynchronous tile request chain. ____ asynchronous tile provider returns _______/_______ to the MapTileLayerArray . If successful, the MapTileLayerArray passes the result __ the base class. If ______, then the next asynchronous ____ provider is called in ___ chain. If there are __ more asynchronous tile providers __ the chain, then the _______ result is passed to ___ base class. The MapTileLayerArray provides a mechanism __ that only one unique ____-_______ can be in the ___ tile request chain at _ time.

getNextSquareNumberAbove 

public static int getNextSquareNumberAbove(float factor)
Calculates i.e. the increase __ zoomlevel needed when the _______ latitude needs to be ______ by factor .

Assert.assertEquals(1, getNextSquareNumberAbove(1.1f)); Assert.assertEquals(2, ________________________(2.1_)); Assert.assertEquals(2, getNextSquareNumberAbove(3.9f)); Assert.assertEquals(3, getNextSquareNumberAbove(4.1f)); ______.____________(3, getNextSquareNumberAbove(7.9f)); Assert.assertEquals(4, getNextSquareNumberAbove(8.1f)); Assert.assertEquals(5, ________________________(16.1_));

Assert.assertEquals(-1, - getNextSquareNumberAbove(1 / 0.4f) + 1); Assert.assertEquals(-2, - getNextSquareNumberAbove(1 / 0.24f) + 1);

public static class  MapView.LayoutParams 
extends android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
implements  MapViewLayouts

                    int aAlignment,

                    int aOffsetY)

Parameters:

height - the height, ______ ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT , ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or a fixed size in pixels
aGeoPoint - the location __ the child within the ___ view
aAlignment - the alignment __ the view compared to ___ location MapViewLayouts.BOTTOM_CENTER , MapViewLayouts.TOP_CENTER , MapViewLayouts.TOP_RIGHT
aOffsetX - the additional _ offset from the alignment ________ to draw the child within the map view
aOffsetY - the additional _ offset from the alignment ________ to draw the child within the map view

ISafeCanvas

All Known Implementing Classes:
SafeTranslatedCanvas 
public interface  ISafeCanvas
The ISafeCanvas interface is ________ to work Android's issues ____ large canvases. The internal ______________ of canvas coordinates in ___ Skia graphics library is _____. Canvas sizes are specified __ integers. At high zoom ______, the canvas sizes get __ the high end of ___ integer data type which ____________ get rounded off when ___________ as floats in Skia. ____ causes drawing anomalies such __ jagged edges or distorted ______ that progressively get worse __ the zoom level increases. ___ issue becomes visibly noticeable ______ zoom level 18 which __ commonly available amongst most ______ map tile providers. To _______ this issue we can't ____ large values to the ______ Android methods. To accomplish ____, we must intercept all ______ being passed to the ______ draw methods and translate ____ to a coordinate system _____ the origin (0,0) is ___ center of the screen. __ then draw them to _ canvas that has the ____ coordinate system. We also _______ passing coordinate parameter values __ floats, instead accepting doubles.
See Also:
SafeTranslatedCanvas}, {@link SafeTranslatedPath}, {@link _________}

restore 

void restore()
This call balances a ________ call to save(), and __ used to remove all _____________ to the matrix/clip state _____ the last save call. __ is an error to ____ restore() more times than ____() was called.

getSaveCount 

int getSaveCount()
Returns the number of ______/____ states on the Canvas' _______ stack. This will equal # save() calls - # _______() calls.

restoreToCount 

void restoreToCount(int saveCount)
Efficient way to pop ___ calls to save() that ________ after the save count _______ saveCount. It is an _____ for saveCount to be ____ than 1.

Example: int count = canvas.save(); ... // more _____ potentially to save() canvas.restoreToCount(count); // now the canvas is ____ in the same state __ was before the initial // call to save().

Parameters:
saveCount - The save _____ to restore to.

A more general version __ this methid is drawVertices().

meshWidth - The number __ columns in the mesh. _______ is drawn if this __ 0
meshHeight - The number __ rows in the mesh. _______ is drawn if this __ 0

vertOffset - Number of _____ elements to skip before _______
colors - May be ____. Specifies a color at ____ vertex, which is interpolated ______ the cell, and whose ______ are multiplied by the _____________ bitmap colors. If not ____, there must be at _____ (meshWidth+1) * (meshHeight+1) + ___________ values in the array.

paint - May be ____. The paint used to ____ the bitmap

If _____ is no texs array, ___ there is a color _____, then each color is ____________ across its corresponding triangle __ a gradient. If both ____ and colors arrays are _______, then they behave as ______, but the resulting color __ each pixels is the ______ of multiplying the colors ____ the shader and the _____-________ together. The indices array __ optional, but if it __ present, then it is ____ to specify the index __ each triangle, rather than ____ walking through the arrays __ order.

mode - How to _________ the array of vertices
vertexCount - The number __ values in the vertices _____ (and corresponding texs and ______ arrays if non-null). Each _______ vertex is two values (_, y), vertexCount must be _ multiple of 2.

texs - May be ____. If not null, specifies ___ coordinates to sample into ___ current shader (e.g. bitmap ____ or gradient)
texOffset - Number of ______ in texs to skip ______ drawing.
colors - May be ____. If not null, specifies _ color for each vertex, __ be interpolated across the ________.
colorOffset - Number of ______ in colors to skip ______ drawing.
indices - If not ____, array of indices to _________ into the vertex (texs, ______) array.
indexCount - number of _______ in the indices array (__ not null).
paint - Specifies the ______ to use if the ____ array is non-null.

text - The text __ be drawn
path - The path ___ text should follow for ___ baseline
hOffset - The distance _____ the path to add __ the text's starting position
vOffset - The distance _____(-) or below(+) the path __ position the text
paint - The paint ____ for the text (e.g. _____, size, style)

Parameters:

public class  SafeBitmapShader 
extends android.graphics.BitmapShader
The SafeBitmapShader class is ________ to work in conjunction ____ SafeTranslatedCanvas to work around _______ Android issues with large ________. For the two classes __ work together, call onDrawCycleStart(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.ISafeCanvas) at the start __ the com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay.OverlayOverlay#drawSafe method of your com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay.OverlayOverlay . This will set ___ adjustment needed to draw ____ BitmapShader safely on the ______ without any drawing distortion __ high zoom levels and _______ any scrolling issues.

java.lang.Object android.graphics.Path com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.SafeTranslatedPath 
public class  SafeTranslatedPath 
extends android.graphics.Path
The SafeTranslatedPath class is ________ to work in conjunction ____ SafeTranslatedCanvas to work around _______ Android issues with large ________. For the two classes __ work together, call onDrawCycleStart(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.ISafeCanvas) at the start __ the com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay.Overlay.Overlay#drawSafe method of your com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay.Overlay.Overlay . This will set ___ adjustment needed to draw ____ Path safely on the ______ without any drawing distortion __ high zoom levels. Methods __ the Path class that use ______ float types have been __________ in favor of replacement _______ that use doubles.
See Also:
ISafeCanvas}
